title: Enhanced surface activation of ground tire rubber via the radiolysis of water for effective rubber recycling
content:
Publication date: 30 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 18

Author(s): Lóránt Kiss, Alexandra Erzsébet Berényi, Miklós Németh, Anna Tegze, Renáta Homlok, Erzsébet Takács, László Mészáros
